channel.title: Nosql on DataFibers
channel.description: Recent content in Nosql on DataFibers

item.title: NoSQL Overview
item.description: Overview NoSQL (NoSQL = Not Only SQL) means “not just SQL”. Modern computing systems generate a huge amount of data every day on the network. A large part of these data are handled by relational database management systems (RDBMSs). Its matured relational theory foundation makes data modeling and application programming easier. However, with the wave of informationization and the rise of the Internet, traditional RDBMSs have started to experience problems in some paticular domain.
